attributes.action: Petitions which counter other petitions on this site should not be rejected.
attributes.background: A number of petitions to allow Donald Trump to come to the UK on a state visit have been rejected. To reject these petitions is not fair to those of the public who disagree. In the interest of democracy this site should not prevent an alternative view being express on an equal platform.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like us to take. A petition in favour of President Trump's state visit is open on the site. You can see it here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178844

Other petitions on this subject have been rejected because they are asking for the same action as an existing petition.
